mapper.select: SELECT p.pval,p.ptype,p.leaf FROM sys_perm p, sys_role_perm rp WHERE p.pval = rp.perm_val AND rp.role_id = #{roleId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO sys_perm (pval,parent,pname,ptype,leaf,created) VALUES
(#{p.pval},#{p.parent},#{p.pname},#{p.ptype},#{p.leaf},#{p.created})
